titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment or recess of the Senate and an adjournment of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
8/7/2012--Passed House without amendment. Declares that when the Senate recesses or adjourns on any day from Thursday, August 2, 2012, through Tuesday, August 7, 2012, it stand recessed or adjourned until 12:00 noon on Monday, September 10, 2012.
Declares that when the House adjourns on any legislative day from Thursday, August 2, 2012, through Tuesday, August 7, 2012, it stand adjourned until 2:00 p.m. on Monday, September 10, 2012.
